price: prokleti su! Gdje god da se nađu, neka budu uhvaćeni i ubijeni,
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
